label: C0
headline: Pittsburgh Water pauses Four Mile Run and three other flood mitigation projects due to funding shortfalls.

label: C21
headline: Council holds public hearing on bill to reduce minimum lot sizes for residential development.

label: C20
headline: Council schedules meeting on police, EMS and fire equipment after ambulance breaks down responding to emergency call.

label: C25
headline: Council holds ordinance to increase paid sick leave accrual rates and maximum hours for public hearing.

headline: Council approves $40,000 contract with law firm for immigration legal services.

label: C13
headline: Council approves $37,000 grant to help police investigate old sexual assault cases and improve interview rooms.

label: C19
headline: Council approves $8,200 deal to let ALCOSAN build underground tunnels through nine city properties.

label: C27
headline: Council approves agreement for six new bus shelters in Hazelwood at no cost to the city.

label: C12
headline: City Council approves sale of 14 vacant lots in 12th Ward to Larimer Consensus Group to settle court cases.

label: C14
headline: Council approves application for $250,000 state grant to fix Emerald View Trail with city matching funds.

label: C16
headline: Council expands residential permit parking program to more South Side Flats streets.

label: C29
headline: Council approves transferring city property at 219 Reifert Street to Pittsburgh Land Bank for $1.

label: C8
headline: Council introduces ordinance allowing residents to plant and maintain native gardens and natural landscapes on their property.

label: C18
headline: Council approves sewage plan revision for South Side townhome development at no cost to the City.

label: C5
headline: Council refers resolution to authorize $750,000 annual contracts with five vendors for special events services.

label: C6
headline: Council authorizes temporary construction easements on city property for Smithfield Street repair project.

label: C7
headline: Council refers resolution allowing Riverlife to use city dock for public river barge programming to committee.

label: C26
headline: Council approves agreement for University of Pittsburgh to pay for extra trash pickup in Oakland during student move-in and move-out periods.

headline: Council passes ordinance clarifying rules for posting residential parking permit signs.

label: C9
headline: Council designates Donny's Place on Herron Avenue as historic structure despite owner opposition.

headline: Council cancels sale of 136 Bodkin Street property and orders refund of hand money.

headline: Council holds resolution to transfer $33,292 for employee tuition reimbursement for six weeks.
